mapper.select: SELECT A.usr_seq, A.usr_id, A.usr_phone, A.usr_nickname, A.usr_name, A.usr_adrs, B.file_dir_name, B.file_name FROM tb_user A LEFT JOIN tb_file_user B ON A.usr_seq = B.usr_seq WHERE A.usr_seq = #{usrSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_file_user ( usr_seq, file_dir_name, file_name, file_usr_cret_date ) VALUES ( #{usrSeq}, #{fileDirName}, #{fileName}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT tmp.file_dir_name, tmp.file_name, D.usr_id, D.usr_nickname FROM (SELECT A.usr_seq, A.usr_id, B.followed_usr_seq, C.file_dir_name, C.file_name FROM tb_user A LEFT JOIN tb_user_follow B ON A.usr_seq = B.usr_seq JOIN tb_file_user C ON B.followed_usr_seq = C.usr_seq WHERE A.usr_seq = #{usrSeq}) AS tmp LEFT JOIN tb_user D ON tmp.followed_usr_seq = D.usr_seq
